Package org.lockout

package org.lockout
  • Class
    Description
    Action
    Defines the schema for Action field api post requests for storing, updating, revealing etc of secrets.
    AppUtils
    Some static utility functions defined here.
    Data
    Represents one "row" in the DynamoDB table.
    Dbops
    All database calls here.
    Getinfo
    Getting User Info related methods here.
    Glogger
    Just a Global logger wrapping LambdaLogger class from AWS.
    Handler
    Entry point for the lambda request cycle.
    Info
    Represents 1 Secret
    LambdaInput
    The blueprint into which I want to deserialise everything that I consider useful about the HTTP request coming to lambda.
    Login
    Login related methods here.
    Main
    Just exists to scaffold some basic tests locally.
    RequestContext
    Holds request timing, method (GET/POST/etc), path or route, and IP for the request source.
    RequestContext.Http
     
    Router
    Class responsible for implementing routing stuff.
    Signup
    Signup related methods here.
    Updates
    Updating User Info related methods here.
    User
    Full representation of a User Embedded in every UserRequest and its child classes.
    UserRequest
    Final form of the incoming user request.
